TitleEnglish: Why the Hell Are You Here, Teacher!?
SummaryEnglish: Ichiro Sato is about as average as a student can get… except for his above-average ability to land himself in totally awkward, intensely risqué situations with his no-nonsense teacher, Kana Kojima! Ichiro has his hands full dealing with these steamy shenanigans and unexpected encounters in the most unlikely places. At least it can’t get any worse, right?
Aliases: Why the Hell are You Here, Teacher!

1.SummaryEnglish: Unaired episode included with the Blu-ray box set.
How was Ichiro supposed to know his teacher, Kana, was using the men’s restroom? And now she needs his help with WHAT in the infirmary!?

2.SummaryEnglish: Ichiro and Kana are trapped inside a laundromat during a thunderstorm! Afterward, summer vacation is finally here! So, why is Kana at Ichiro’s house babysitting his sister?

3.SummaryEnglish: There’s probably a perfectly innocent, unsuspicious reason why Kana’s currently in Ichiro’s room. On a related note, is Ichiro’s mom up to something, or is that just paranoia?

4.SummaryEnglish: Kana and Ichiro find themselves all alone on the beach and in denial of their feelings. But there’s sunscreen to rub on and venomous bites to treat…

5.SummaryEnglish: Mayu wishes to grow closer with Rin and lunchtime provides the perfect chance! Later, Rin must shield Mayu from prying eyes after her shirt gets caught in the train door.

6.SummaryEnglish: Rin and Mayu run into each other on a rainy day. Later, Mayu recalls when she first met Rin.

7.SummaryEnglish: Takashi returns home and finds Hikari in his bed. Later, Hikari decides she’s taking Takashi shopping whether he wants to or not.

8.SummaryEnglish: Takahashi’s coming down with hypothermia and Hikari must warm him up. Later, Hikari’s mischievous nature catches up to Rin and Mayu. Handcuffs are involved.

9.SummaryEnglish: Hikari grows jealous of Takahashi and Saya’s relationship, resulting in an embarrassing moment for everyone involved. Has this finally cost Hikari her bond with Takahashi?

10.SummaryEnglish: Koh vows to find a girlfriend before graduation, but it’s not like he’s got the chance to meet girls. Wait… Why the Hell is the School Nurse Here at his job!?

11.SummaryEnglish: Koh humors Chizuru by agreeing to split her lottery prize, but he doesn't know she's about to hit the jackpot. Now they're going on an all-expenses paid vacation together!

12.SummaryEnglish: Koh didn’t get any chocolates on Valentine’s Day. Will his luck change after he runs into Chizuru? Either way, graduation is approaching and he has yet to find a girlfriend...
